DOC.brief_summary: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) dysfunction endocrine system woman reproductive age . Approximately 5 % -10 % woman China syndrome . Irregular menstruation ( oligomenorrhea amenorrhea ) , hirsutism obesity common clinical manifestation PCOS . The aim study determine whether electroacupuncture normalize hormonal glycometabolic profile woman polycystic ovary syndrome compare placebo-needle .
DOC.brief_title: Electroacupuncture Hormonal Glycometabolic Profiles Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome : Study Protocol
DOC.criteria: least two follow feature meet Rotterdam diagnostic criterion : Oligomenorrhoea amenorrhoea : Oligomenorrhoea define intermenstrual interval > 35 day < 8 menstrual bleeding past year . Amenorrhoea define absent menstrual bleed menstrual bleed previous 90 day Clinical biochemical hyperandrogenism : Biochemical hyperandrogenaemia define total serum testosterone concentration 60 ng/dL , and/or clinical hyperandrogenism define FerrimanGallwey ( FG ) score ≥5 acne define global Acne Grading System ( GAS ) `` mild '' / '' moderate '' / '' severe '' / '' severe '' Polycystic ovary morphology define presence ≥12 follicle ovary measure 29 mm diameter and/or ovarian volume > 10 mL transvaginal scanning . 1840 year old join research sign inform consent voluntarily Participants fulfil follow criterion include . endocrine disorder thyroid dysfunction , adrenal disorder diabetes ovulation disorder cause hyperandrogenemia , premature ovarian failure amenorrhea cause hypothalamus pituitary disorder hyperandrogenemia cause congenital adrenal hyperplasia , Cushing 's syndrome androgensecreting tumor take Diane35 past 3 month serious heart condition , hepatic disease , renal system disease , hematopoietic system disease , malnutrition whole body receive treatment protocol trial past 30 day Participants fulfil one follow criterion exclude .
